originalTitle: Pilot praised after crash-landing faulty Somali passenger plane on seashore
title: Amazing Pilot Lands Plane Safely on the Beach in Somalia!
content:
Hello, my super friends! It's your friendly African news reporter here, ready to tell you an amazing story from our big, beautiful continent, Africa! Get ready for a tale about a super brave pilot and a very, very safe landing that made everyone cheer! We are going to talk about a recent event in a country called Somalia, right here in Africa, where something surprising happened, but it had a wonderfully happy ending for everyone.

A Big Plane, a Brave Pilot!

Imagine a very big airplane, flying high up in the blue sky, like a giant bird with shiny wings. This plane had 55 people inside – that's like a whole lot of your classmates and their teachers all together! It was flying in the sky above Somalia, a lovely country in Africa, and it was getting ready to land. The pilot, who is the very special person who flies the plane and makes it go, was getting ready to bring the plane down gently onto the ground. But guess what? Sometimes, even super-duper machines like airplanes can have a little bit of a problem. On this day, the plane had a small glitch, and it couldn't land on the usual spot. That usual spot is called a **runway**. A runway is like a very long, smooth road made just for planes to land on and to take off from. It's like a special highway for big flying machines! *Did you know?* Most airplanes have two big wings that help them fly high in the sky, just like how birds use their wings to soar! These wings are very strong.

Landing on the Seashore!

Instead of landing on the runway, the pilot had to be super quick and super clever! He looked outside and saw the big, beautiful blue ocean. Next to the ocean, there was a sandy **seashore** – that's the part where the land meets the water, like a sandy beach. The pilot made a very important decision. He decided to land the plane right there, on the soft sand of the seashore! Can you imagine a huge airplane landing on the beach? It might sound a little bit scary or very surprising, but it was actually a very, very smart choice. The plane touched down softly on the sand, right next to the sparkling ocean. Everyone inside the plane was okay! No one got hurt at all. Isn't that the most wonderful news? Everyone was safe and sound, thanks to the pilot's quick thinking and amazing skills! *Did you know?* The seashore is often a lovely place with sand and shells, where people like to play and swim. But it's not usually where planes land!

Our Hero Pilot!

The pilot of that airplane is a real hero! When things started to go a little bit wrong, he didn't panic. He stayed calm and thought very, very fast. Pilots are super smart people who go to special schools and train for many, many years to learn how to fly planes. They learn how to make the plane go up, come down, and how to handle any kind of problem, big or small. They are like super problem-solvers in the sky! This pilot used all his training and all his cleverness to keep everyone safe. He made sure all 55 people on board could go home to their families and friends. Everyone is saying a big 'thank you' to him for being so brave and so smart. It shows how important it is to listen and learn, just like the pilot did in his training, so you can do amazing things too! *Did you know?* Pilots wear special uniforms and sit in a special part of the plane called the **cockpit**. The cockpit is like the 'brain' of the airplane, full of buttons, screens, and controls that help the pilot fly the plane!

Why Was it Tricky?

The plane had a little problem, which made it hard to land in the usual way on the runway. Sometimes, even the very best and newest machines, like big airplanes, can have a tiny glitch or a small part that doesn't work perfectly. But the really good news is that the people who build airplanes and the people who fly them always, always think about **safety first**! They want to make sure that everyone who flies is always super safe. That's why pilots train so much for different situations.

Everyone is Safe and Sound!

After the plane landed gently on the sandy beach, lots of kind people came to help. Firefighters, who are brave people who help in emergencies, and doctors, who help people when they are sick or hurt, quickly came to the seashore. They made sure everyone was okay and helped them get off the airplane safely. Everyone was looked after and made comfortable. It was such a happy ending for everyone on board! This story shows us how important it is for people to help each other, especially when something unexpected happens. When people work together, like the pilot and the helpers on the ground, amazing things can happen, and everyone can be safe.

Flying is Super Safe!

Did you know that flying in an airplane is actually one of the safest ways to travel? Yes, it's true! There are so many clever people who work very hard to make sure planes are safe. From the engineers who design and build the planes, to the mechanics who check them before every single flight, and of course, the amazing pilots who fly them! They all work together to make sure that your journey in an airplane is safe and fun. So, if you ever get to fly in an airplane, you can still feel safe and excited for your adventure! It's a wonderful way to see our big world from up high. *Did you know?* Africa has many beautiful airports, and people fly all over our amazing continent to visit new places, explore different countries, and see their family and friends!

What We Learn from This Story

This amazing story from Somalia teaches us a very important lesson. It shows us that even when things don't go exactly as we planned, with bravery, quick thinking, and smart decisions, we can still have a happy ending. It also shows us how important it is to have clever and calm people, like our pilot, looking after us. And remember to always listen to grown-ups, because they often know the best ways to keep you safe and sound! Hooray for our hero pilot and safe landings! That's all for now from your friendly African news reporter! Keep being curious and brave!

originalTitle: Son of Zambia's ex-President Lungu ordered to surrender 79 cars, petrol station and 'luxury' flats
title: Son of Zambia's ex-President Lungu ordered to surrender 79 cars, petrol station and 'luxury' flats
content: The High Court judgement says Dalitso Lungu, 39, failed to show they were acquired lawfully.

originalTitle: Kenya to confront Russia over 'unacceptable' use of its nationals in combat
title: Kenya Wants All Its People Safe!
content:
Hello, Friends!

Hi everyone! It's your friendly news reporter, bringing you exciting and important stories from our amazing continent, Africa! Today, we're talking about our neighbor, Kenya. Kenya is a beautiful country with yummy food and amazing animals, just like many places in Africa. Something important is happening there. Kenya is making sure all its people are safe, even those who went very far away to a country called Russia.

What's This All About?

Imagine someone you know goes on a big trip. But then, they get into trouble in that faraway place. That's a little bit like what happened. Some people from Kenya went to Russia. Now, Russia is a very big country, far, far away from Africa. In some parts of the world, there are wars. Wars are when people fight each other. It's very sad and scary, and it means people get hurt. Some Kenyans ended up in Russia, and they were asked to fight in a war there. Kenya loves its people very much. They don't want anyone from Kenya to be fighting in wars, especially not in a faraway land. It's not safe, and it's not what they went there for. Our leaders in Kenya want everyone to be safe and happy at home, or doing safe work abroad.

Tricky People and Bad Rules

Sometimes, there are people who are not very kind or honest. We call them 'recruiters' in this story. These people might have told Kenyans, "Come to Russia for a good job! It will be lots of money!" But maybe they didn't tell them the whole truth. Maybe they tricked them into going there to fight in a war instead of doing safe work. That's like someone promising you a yummy treat, but then giving you something yucky instead! Kenya thinks this is very, very wrong. It's not fair to trick people and put them in danger. **Did you know?** Kenya is home to amazing animals like lions, elephants, and giraffes! It's famous for its beautiful national parks and exciting safaris!

Kenya Takes Action!

So, what did Kenya do when they found out about these tricky people? Our wonderful Kenyan leaders said, 'No more of this!' They found the people who were tricking Kenyans. These tricky recruiters were doing something illegal, which means against the rules and laws of the country. Kenya stopped them! It's like when you have a game, and someone is cheating. You stop the cheating to make sure everyone plays fair! Kenya stopped these bad recruiters from tricking more people and sending them to danger. This is great news for keeping people safe and protecting them from harm. **Did you know?** Africa is the second-largest continent in the world! It has 54 amazing countries, each with its own special stories, cultures, and friendly people!

Talking to Our Friends in Russia

Next, Kenya wants to talk to Russia. It's like when you have a friend, and they do something you don't like. You don't shout, but you talk to them nicely and say, 'Hey, that wasn't very kind, please don't do that again.' Kenya is going to talk to Russia and tell them, 'It's not okay to use our people to fight in a war.' Kenya will tell Russia that using Kenyans to fight is 'unacceptable.' That's a big word, but it just means 'not okay' or 'we don't like it.' It means Kenya wants Russia to understand that this is a serious problem for Kenya. **Did you know?** Talking nicely to solve problems between countries is called 'diplomacy'! It's like countries being good neighbors and working things out together.

Making a Promise: A Special Deal

Kenya also wants Russia to sign a special paper. We call this a 'deal' or an 'agreement.' It's like when you promise your mom or dad you'll clean your room, and you shake hands. This paper would be a promise that Russia won't ever ask Kenyans to fight in their wars again. It's a very important promise! This promise will 'ban conscription.' 'Banning' means saying 'no' forever. 'Conscription' is when a country makes people join its army and fight, even if they don't want to. Kenya wants Russia to promise not to make Kenyans fight in their army. This promise is very, very important. It means Kenyans will be safe, and other countries will know they can't just ask people from Kenya to fight in their wars. It protects Kenyans far away from home.

Why Is This So Important for All of Us?

This story from Kenya shows us how much our leaders care about us. They want to protect everyone, no matter where they are. It's like your parents always wanting to keep you safe and out of danger. This makes us feel safe and cared for. It also shows that countries need to talk to each other and be fair. When everyone follows the rules and respects each other, the world is a happier and safer place for all of us. This is how we build a peaceful world. **Did you know?** Many people from Africa travel to other countries for school or work! It's important they stay safe and sound wherever they go! **Did you know?** Kenya has a special person called a President! The President is like the head of the country, making sure everything runs well and people are happy and safe!

Our African Family

We are all one big family in Africa. When one country like Kenya helps its people, it makes all of us proud. It shows that we care about each other and stand up for what is right. We want all Africans to be safe and treated fairly. It reminds us that safety is very important. Always be careful about who you trust, especially if they tell you to go very far away for something that sounds too good to be true. Always talk to a trusted adult if you have questions. **Did you know?** The capital city of Kenya is Nairobi! It's a big, busy city with tall buildings, delicious food, and lots of friendly people!

Staying Safe and Happy

So, Kenya is working hard to bring its people home and make sure they are safe. They are stopping bad people and talking to Russia to make things right. This is a very good thing! Our leaders are looking out for us. Remember to always listen to your parents and teachers, and always put safety first. We'll keep you updated on more important news from our amazing continent! See you next time, young explorers! Stay curious and stay safe!
summary: Kenya is working hard to protect its citizens by stopping illegal recruiters and talking to Russia to ensure no Kenyans are used to fight in faraway wars.
whyMatters: This matters because Kenya wants to keep all its people safe, no matter where they are in the world, and make sure all countries follow fair rules and respect each other.

originalTitle: Pakistan beat USA to avenge T20 World Cup upset

originalTitle: Mateta knee injury 'not as bad as feared'
title: Mateta knee injury 'not as bad as feared'
content: The knee injury which scuppered Jean-Philippe Mateta's move to AC Milan last month is "not as bad as feared" and he will not need surgery, says Crystal Palace manager Oliver Glasner.
